header.title: Solid waste management
header.caption: A true commitment to saving and reconstructing our environment with holistic ideals of sustainable development and waste management.

about.title: Welcome to NextGen Greens
about.caption: As one of the leading companies, we ensure that we are constantly evolving. We develop solutions by partnering with our customers after understanding their ever changing waste management needs. We are inspired by challenges and we thrive on them. Working to solve some of the biggest challenges that are choking the environment is what ignites the fire in us.

cta.title: Clean Energy For The Future Of Mankind

image.alt: Next Gen Greens take a pledge

services.title: Restoration of Lakes, Rivers, and Water Bodies
services.caption: The restoration of water bodies to their natural state will build their resilience and work in support of biodiversity, landscape development & natural habitat.

services.title: Open drains and nallahs
services.caption: Open drains are a threat to the health of individuals living nearby as well as the environment due to their contamination. We strive to provide assistance in sludge removal, making the drains cleaner and less susceptible to becoming a breeding ground for diseases.

services.title: Sustainable Development of Parks and Ponds
services.caption: Renovation of defunct ponds by utilizing wastewater generated by nearby residential areas.

services.title: Sewage Treatment Plants
services.caption: To return the clean & treated water to oceans and other water bodies, the contaminated water is first treated and processed to remove potentially harmful chemicals.

services.title: Effluent Treatment Plants
services.caption: Through this process, the chemically charged industrial water undergoes treatment to make it reusable and facilitate its safe discharge into the surrounding environment.

services.title: Composting Centers
services.caption: With the help of composting centres, the waste generated is diversified based on its composition and is then treated optimally. Initiatives like the four R’s (Reduce, Reuse, Recycle and Recover) come into the picture and serve as a landfill life booster.

services.title: Swachh Survekshan Consultancy
services.caption: With our expertise of 3+ years in this industry, we also provide consultancy services to promote and implement real-time impact.

services.title: Training Services for Municipalities
services.caption: We specialize in rendering sustainable and viable alternatives to improve the management of waste in today’s timeline.

services.title: Institutions
services.caption: We help attain greater environmental sustainability objectives while prudently financing the waste-program budget for all our innovations.

services.title: Hotels
services.caption: We provide a one-stop solution from solid waste management (SWM) to solid-liquid waste management (SLWM) for the hotel chains to adopt a better & feasible waste management strategy.

services.title: Corporate/Tech Parks
services.caption: With increasing climate crises, all the organizations irrespective of their domains are adopting eco-friendly initiatives and promoting the various related schemes in their working spheres. We also aim to sensitize and encourage huge corporations to contribute to our cause.

services.title: Residential
services.caption: Another initiative of ours inculcates proper waste segregation and management through eco-friendly door-to-door services in different residential areas to eradicate negligent disposal.

about.title: About Us
about.caption: We are a leading Global Wastewater & Solid waste management company, and our purpose is simple
about.sub-caption: Creating a better world for us to live in. It is our utmost priority to make India one of the cleanest countries in the world.

desc.text: As one of the leading companies, we ensure that we are constantly evolving. We develop solutions by partnering with our customers after understanding their ever-changing waste management needs. The challenge is what drives us. Our work addresses the most pressing challenges that are degrading the environment ignites the fire in us.

Our path-breaking technologies are capable of treating all kinds of waste and plays a prime role in making a difference each day by changing the current state of the environment and committing to a better society following the idea of sustainable development.

The need of the hour is to ask ourselves: Have we done enough for our planet? We have a burning desire to make a paradigm shift in the way we treat our surroundings and waste. Our core values include making a significant impact with our resources and innovations along with consistent teamwork to get desired results. Our goal is to make the environment cleaner and more sustainable by treating waste and wastewater.

awards.caption: Awarded by Hon. Minister of Science and Technology,  Dr. Harshvardhan (July 2017)
Skoch Award 2017 for (Solid Liquid Waste Management) SLWM Technologies

awards.title: WEE, IIT Delhi Women Enterpreneurs 2020 Batch Pitching Results
awards.name: Dr. Kalpana Arora (silver winner)
awards.caption: Women Entrepreneurship and Empowerment (WEE) Award 2020 by Department of Science & Technology an d IIT Delhi for Waste Water Treatment

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.caption: Our purpose is clear , We start with the idea of use - It's Reuse
vision.text: We will shape country's largest socially relevant integrated waste & water management enterprise focused on recycling, re- processing, re-use & re- create
